trans-unit.resname: WOC·1 | Tegwyll, Duke of Splendor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tegwyll, Duke of Splendor
trans-unit.target: 辉美公爵特维尔

trans-unit.resname: WOC·1 | Tegwyll, Duke of Splendor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, deathtouch\nOther Faeries you control get +1/+1.\nWhenever another Faerie you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，死触 由你操控的其他仙灵得+1/+1。 每当另一个由你操控的仙灵死去时，你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·1 | Tegwyll, Duke of Splendor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He weaves glamours as easily as breathing, his otherworldly beauty entrancing fae and mortal alike.
trans-unit.target: 他举止优雅华贵、魅力四射，美貌超凡脱俗，令仙儿与凡人均为之着迷。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·2 | Ellivere of the Wild Court | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ellivere of the Wild Court
trans-unit.target: 幻野廷的莉薇尔

trans-unit.resname: WOC·2 | Ellivere of the Wild Court | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, create a Virtuous Role token attached to another target creature you control. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control.)\nWhenever an enchanted creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，派出一个善人角色衍生物，并贴附在另一个目标由你操控的生物上。（如果其上已有另一个你操控的角色，则将已有之角色置入坟墓场。你每操控一个结界，所结附的生物便得+1/+1。） 每当一个由你操控且受有灵气的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·3 | Alela, Cunning Conqueror | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Alela, Cunning Conqueror
trans-unit.target: 黠智霸主阿莉莱

trans-unit.resname: WOC·3 | Alela, Cunning Conqueror | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.\nWhenever one or more Faeries you control deal combat damage to a player, goad target creature that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你施放每个对手回合中你的第一个咒语时，派出一个1/1黑色，具飞行异能的仙灵／浪客衍生生物。 每当由你操控的一个或数个仙灵对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，煽惑目标由该牌手操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·4 | Gylwain, Casting Director | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gylwain, Casting Director
trans-unit.target: 选角督导桂尔温

trans-unit.resname: WOC·4 | Gylwain, Casting Director | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Whenever CARDNAME or another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —
• Create a Royal Role token attached to that creature.
• Create a Sorcerer Role token attached to that creature.
• Create a Monster Role token attached to that creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个非衍生物的生物在你的操控下进战场时，选择一项～ •派出一个皇族角色衍生物并贴附在该生物上。 •派出一个术士角色衍生物并贴附在该生物上。 •派出一个怪物角色衍生物并贴附在该生物上。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·21 | Court of Ardenvale | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Court of Ardenvale
trans-unit.target: 雅登瓦廷

trans-unit.resname: WOC·21 | Court of Ardenvale | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand. If you're the monarch, return that permanent card to the battlefield instead.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。 在你的维持开始时，将目标法术力值等于或小于3的永久物牌从你坟墓场移回你手上。若你是君主，则改为将该永久物牌移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·22 | Court of Vantress | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Court of Vantress
trans-unit.target: 凡翠丝廷

trans-unit.resname: WOC·22 | Court of Vantress | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, choose up to one other target enchantment or artifact. If you're the monarch, you may create a token that's a copy of it. If you're not the monarch, you may have CARDNAME become a copy of it, except it has this ability.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。 在你的维持开始时，选择至多另一个目标结界或神器。若你是君主，则你可以派出一个为其复制品的衍生物。若你不是君主，则你可以使CARDNAME成为其复制品，但它具有此异能。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·23 | Court of Locthwain | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Court of Locthwain
trans-unit.target: 洛司温廷

trans-unit.resname: WOC·23 | Court of Locthwain | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of target opponent's library. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it. If you're the monarch, until end of turn, you may cast a spell from among cards exiled with CARDNAME without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。 在你的维持开始时，放逐目标对手的牌库顶牌。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以使用该牌，且能用任意种类的法术力来施放。若你是君主，则直到回合结束，你可以从以CARDNAME放逐的牌之中施放一个咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·24 | Court of Embereth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Court of Embereth
trans-unit.target: 鞍博雷廷

trans-unit.resname: WOC·24 | Court of Embereth | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, create a 3/1 red Knight creature token. Then if you're the monarch, CARDNAME deals X damage to each opponent, where X is the number of creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。 在你的维持开始时，派出一个3/1红色骑士衍生生物。然后若你是君主，则CARDNAME向每位对手各造成X点伤害，X为由你操控的生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·25 | Court of Garenbrig | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Court of Garenbrig
trans-unit.target: 盖伦碧廷

trans-unit.resname: WOC·25 | Court of Garenbrig | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, distribute two +1/+1 counters among up to two target creatures. Then if you're the monarch, double the number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。 在你的维持开始时，将两个+1/+1指示物分配给至多两个目标生物。然后若你是君主，则将每个由你操控的生物上之+1/+1指示物数量加倍。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·26 | Korvold, Gleeful Glutton | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Korvold, Gleeful Glutton
trans-unit.target: 欢喜饕龙寇沃

trans-unit.resname: WOC·26 | Korvold, Gleeful Glutton | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card type among permanents you've sacrificed this turn.\nFlying, trample, haste\nWhenever Korvold deals combat damage to a player, put X +1/+1 counters on Korvold and draw X cards, where X is the number of permanent types among cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 你本回合中牺牲的永久物间每有一种牌张类别，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。 飞行，践踏，敏捷 每当寇沃对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，在寇沃上放置X个+1/+1指示物且抓X张牌，X为你坟墓场中牌的永久物类别数量。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·27 | Brenard, Ginger Sculptor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Brenard, Ginger Sculptor
trans-unit.target: 姜饼塑师布瑞纳

trans-unit.resname: WOC·27 | Brenard, Ginger Sculptor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control that's a Food or a Golem gets +2/+2 and has trample.\nWhenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a 1/1 Food Golem artifact creature in addition to its other types and it has "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life."
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控且为食品或魔像的生物均得+2/+2且具有践踏异能。 每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，你可以将它放逐。若你如此作，则派出一个为该生物复制品的衍生物，但它是1/1食品／魔像神器生物，仍具有原本类别，且具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命。」

trans-unit.resname: WOC·28 | Throne of Eldraine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Throne of Eldraine
trans-unit.target: 艾卓王权之座

trans-unit.resname: WOC·28 | Throne of Eldraine | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a color.\n{T}: Add four mana of the chosen color. Spend this mana only to cast monocolored spells of that color.\n{3}, {T}: Draw two cards. Spend only mana of the chosen color to activate this ability.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种颜色。 {T}：加四点所选颜色的法术力。此法术力只能用来施放该色的单色咒语。 {3}，{T}：抓两张牌。只能用所选颜色的法术力来起动此异能。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·41 | Liberated Livestock | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Liberated Livestock
trans-unit.target: 脱缚家畜

trans-unit.resname: WOC·41 | Liberated Livestock | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create a 1/1 white Cat creature token with lifelink, a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying, and a 2/4 white Ox creature token. For each of those tokens, you may put an Aura card from your hand and/or graveyard onto the battlefield attached to it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，派出一个1/1白色、具系命异能的猫衍生生物，一个1/1白色、具飞行异能的鸟衍生生物和一个2/4白色的牛衍生生物。对每个这类衍生物而言，你可以将一张灵气牌从你手上和／或你坟墓场放进战场并贴附于其上。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·42 | Ox Drover | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ox Drover
trans-unit.target: 赶牛人

trans-unit.resname: WOC·42 | Ox Drover | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nCARDNAME can't be blocked by Oxen.\nWhenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, target opponent creates a 2/4 white Ox creature token and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 CARDNAME不能被牛阻挡。 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，目标对手派出一个2/4白色的牛衍生生物，且你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·43 | Songbirds' Blessing | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Songbirds' Blessing
trans-unit.target: 鸣鸟颂福

trans-unit.resname: WOC·43 | Songbirds' Blessing | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhenever enchanted creature attacks, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an Aura card. You may put that card onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 每当所结附的生物攻击时，从你牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张灵气牌为止。你可以将该牌放进战场。若你未如此作，则将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·44 | Unfinished Business | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Unfinished Business
trans-unit.target: 未竟之业

trans-unit.resname: WOC·44 | Unfinished Business | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then return up to two target Aura and/or Equipment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，然后将至多两张目标灵气和／或武具牌从你的坟墓场移回战场并贴附在该生物上。

trans-unit.target: 回声大法师

trans-unit.source: Flying, ward {2}\nWhenever you cast a Faerie or Wizard permanent spell, copy it. (The copy becomes a token.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行，守护{2} 每当你施放仙灵或法术师永久物咒语时，将它复制。（所成之复制品会成为衍生物。）

trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying\nYou may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature an opponent controls, except it's a Faerie Shapeshifter in addition to its other types and it has flying.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行 你可以使CARDNAME当成任一由对手操控的生物之复制品来进入战场，但它是仙灵／变形兽，仍具有原本类别，且具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: Misleading Signpost

trans-unit.resname: WOC·47 | Misleading Signpost | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield during the declare attackers step, you may reselect which player or permanent target attacking creature is attacking.\n{T}: Add {U}.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME于宣告攻击者步骤中进战场时，你可以为目标进行攻击的生物重新选择所攻击的牌手或永久物。 {T}：加{U}。

trans-unit.target: 弄影仙灵

trans-unit.resname: WOC·48 | Shadow Puppeteers | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, ward {2}\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature tokens with flying.\nWhenever a creature you control with flying attacks, you may have it become a red Dragon with base power and toughness 4/4 in addition to its other colors and types until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever one or more Faeries you control deal combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is its power.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当一个或数个由你操控的仙灵对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 当CARDNAME死去时，每位对手各失去X点生命且你获得X点生命，X为其力量。

trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当由你操控的一个或数个仙灵对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手派出一个4/2红色海盗衍生生物，且具有「此生物不能进行阻挡。」该衍生物在本盘游戏接下来的时段均已煽惑。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·54 | Knickknack Ouphe | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put any number of Aura cards with mana value X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then put all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物。 当CARDNAME进战场时，展示你牌库顶的X张牌。你可以将其中任意数量法术力值等于或小于X的灵气牌放进战场。然后将所有以此法展示且未放进战场的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以弃一张或数张地牌。当你如此作时，将至多等量的目标非地永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME is enchanted by exactly one Aura, it has base power and toughness 3/3.\nAs long as CARDNAME is enchanted by exactly two Auras, it has base power and toughness 5/5 and vigilance.\nAs long as CARDNAME is enchanted by three or more Auras, it has base power and toughness 10/10, vigilance, and trample.
trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME上受有正好一个灵气，它的基础力量与防御力便为3/3。 只要CARDNAME上受有正好两个灵气，它的基础力量与防御力便为5/5且具有警戒异能。 只要CARDNAME上受有三个或更多灵气，它的基础力量与防御力便为10/10且具有警戒与践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: WOE·78 | Ashiok, Wicked Manipulator | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
If you would pay life while your library has at least that many cards in it, exile that many cards from the top of your library instead.
+1: Look at the top two cards of your library. Exile one of them and put the other into your hand.
−2: Create two 1/1 black Nightmare creature tokens with "At the beginning of combat on your turn, if a card was put into exile this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."
−7: Target player exiles the top X cards of their library, where X is the total mana value of cards you own in exile.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将支付生命时你牌库中有至少相同数量的牌，则改为从你牌库顶放逐等量的牌。 +1：检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张放逐，另一张则置于你手上。 −2：派出两个1/1黑色梦魇衍生生物，且具有「在你回合的战斗开始时，若本回合中有牌进入放逐区，则在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。」 −7：目标牌手放逐其牌库顶的X张牌，X为放逐区中由你拥有之牌的法术力值总和。

trans-unit.resname: WOE·79 | Ashiok's Reaper | Flavor Text

If this spell was bargained, you may put one of those cards with mana value 4 or less onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 加码（你施放此咒语时可以牺牲一个神器，结界或衍生物。） 将至多两张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。如果此咒语已加码，则你可以改为将其中一张法术力值等于或小于4的牌放进战场，而非置于你手上。

trans-unit.source: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.)\nSearch your library for a card, exile it face down, then shuffle. If this spell was bargained, you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost if that spell's mana value is 4 or less. Put the exiled card into your hand if it wasn't cast this way.
trans-unit.target: 加码（你施放此咒语时可以牺牲一个神器，结界或衍生物。） 从你牌库中搜寻一张牌，将它牌面朝下地放逐，然后洗牌。若此咒语已加码，则如果所放逐之牌施放时的咒语之法术力值等于或小于4，你便可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。如果未以此法施放该牌，则将所放逐的牌置于你手上。

That player shuffles, then draws a card for each card exiled from their hand this way.

trans-unit.resname: WOE·100 | Mintstrosity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: If the sugary abominations of Sweettooth Village were ever under someone's control, that time is long past.
trans-unit.target: 就算甘饴村的糖怪以前曾是谁的手下，那时光也早已一去不复返。

trans-unit.target: {1}，牺牲CARDNAME：派出一个青年英雄角色衍生物，并贴附在另一个目标生物上。（如果其上已有另一个你操控的角色，则将已有之角色置入坟墓场。所结附的生物具有「每当此生物攻击时，若它的防御力等于或小于3，则在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。」）

trans-unit.resname: WOE·128 | Flick a Coin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Flick a Coin
trans-unit.target: 轻弹硬币

trans-unit.resname: WOE·128 | Flick a Coin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target. You create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。你派出一个珍宝衍生物。（它是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。） 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOE·128 | Flick a Coin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "From here, hit the antique gong, ricochet off the suit of armor, and get Gunrudd on the nose? Is that all?"
trans-unit.target: 「你要我从这里出手，先打到古锣、弹到铠甲，最后打中老甘头的鼻子？就这么简单？」

trans-unit.resname: WOE·129 | Food Fight | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Food Fight
trans-unit.target: 食物大战

trans-unit.resname: WOE·129 | Food Fight | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Artifacts you control have "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: It deals damage to any target equal to 1 plus the number of permanents named CARDNAME you control."
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的神器具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：它对任意一个目标造成伤害，其数量等同于由你操控且名称为CARDNAME之永久物的数量加1。」

trans-unit.resname: WOE·129 | Food Fight | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: With no time to gather weapons, the dwarves fought the redcaps with anything within reach.
trans-unit.target: 由于没能来得及分发武器，矮人只能靠手边的东西跟红帽客搏斗。

trans-unit.target: 狂乱火束

trans-unit.resname: WOE·130 | Frantic Firebolt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals X damage to target creature, where X is 2 plus the number of cards in your graveyard that are instant cards, sorcery cards, and/or have an Adventure.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物造成X点伤害，X为你坟墓场中瞬间牌、法术牌和／或具历险之牌的总数量加2。

trans-unit.resname: WOE·130 | Frantic Firebolt | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Johann's conjecture about draconic fire dispelling rainwater elementals proved to be correct. Now he just needed a way to dispel draconic fire.
trans-unit.target: 约翰猜想，雨水元素肆虐时可用龙火来驱散。如今这点已经事实验证无误，只是现在他得另找办法来扑灭龙火。

trans-unit.resname: WOE·131 | Gnawing Crescendo | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gnawing Crescendo
trans-unit.target: 啮咬渐响

trans-unit.resname: WOE·131 | Gnawing Crescendo | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies this turn, create a 1/1 black Rat creature token with "This creature can't block."
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+2/+0直到回合结束。本回合中，每当一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，派出一个1/1黑色老鼠衍生生物，且具有「此生物不能进行阻挡。」

trans-unit.resname: WOE·131 | Gnawing Crescendo | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Totentanz's song had no lyrics, but the rats understood it nonetheless. "You own this land," it said. "You deserve to feast."
trans-unit.target: 托腾坦的歌曲中本没有词，但这并不妨碍老鼠理解其中含义。曲是这么唱的：「土地归你，食物归你。」

trans-unit.resname: WOE·134 | Grand Ball Guest | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It takes a lot to pull a master blacksmith from their work, but Maurice couldn't pass up an invitation to a lavish Delverhaugh feast.
trans-unit.target: 铁匠大师手中事务繁多，一般无暇顾及这类闲乐，但毛瑞斯可不愿轻易错过深掘台奢华盛宴的邀请。

trans-unit.resname: WOE·138 | Kindled Heroism | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Even in the grip of Hylda's unnatural cold, something in Kellan felt bright as spring, something that poured into the empty hilts he'd been given by Talion and formed thorn-sharp blades of light.
trans-unit.target: 纵使受困于希尔妲的奇异冰霜之中，凯澜仍觉得有股暖流似春风拂晓在体内不断翻涌、最终流经手尖全数灌入塔莱恩留给自己的残柄，汇成一束如棘刺般尖锐的光芒剑刃。

trans-unit.target: 甘饴村之灾格蕾特

trans-unit.resname: WOE·205 | Greta, Sweettooth Scourge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")\n{G}, Sacrifice a Food: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.\n{1}{B}, Sacrifice a Food: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个食品衍生物。（它是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。） {G}，牺牲一个食品：在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。只能于法术时机起动。 {1}{B}，牺牲一个食品：你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: WOE·206 | Hylda of the Icy Crown | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hylda of the Icy Crown
trans-unit.target: 寒冰冠希尔妲

trans-unit.resname: WOE·206 | Hylda of the Icy Crown | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Whenever you tap an untapped creature an opponent controls, you may pay {1}. When you do, choose one —
• Create a 4/4 white and blue Elemental creature token.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
• Scry 2, then draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你横置一个由对手操控且未横置的生物时，你可以支付{1}。当你如此作时，选择一项～ •派出一个4/4，白蓝双色的元素衍生生物。 •在每个由你操控的生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。 •占卜2，然后抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOE·207 | Johann, Apprentice Sorcerer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Johann, Apprentice Sorcerer
trans-unit.target: 魔法师学徒约翰

trans-unit.resname: WOE·207 | Johann, Apprentice Sorcerer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.\nOnce each turn, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from the top of your library. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。 限每回合一次，你可以从你的牌库顶施放瞬间或法术咒语。（你依旧要支付其费用，且仍须遵守施放时机规则。）

trans-unit.resname: WOE·207 | Johann, Apprentice Sorcerer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Okay. First I'll calm the elementals. Then I'll put out the fire. Then I'll unflood the basement. Then I'll do the chores *myself*."
trans-unit.target: 「好吧。我要先安抚元素。然后扑灭大火。然后抽干地库。最后再自己来收拾。」

trans-unit.resname: WOE·208 | Likeness Looter | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: WOE·208 | Likeness Looter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.\n{X}: CARDNAME becomes a copy of target creature card in your graveyard with mana value X, except it has flying and this ability. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。 {X}：选择目标在你坟墓场中且法术力值为X的生物牌。CARDNAME成为该牌的复制品，但它具有飞行与此异能。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.target: 威慑 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标生物或结界牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。 每当一个由你操控的结界从战场进入坟墓场时，在白涅娃上放置一个+1/+1指示物，然后占卜1。

trans-unit.resname: WOE·211 | Rowan, Scion of War | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "No more days withering at a negotiating table with my brother. I will rebuild Eldraine myself—the old way, with power."
trans-unit.target: 「我不会再在谈判桌前与我弟弟空耗时光。我要亲自重建艾卓～从旧法，凭武力。」

trans-unit.resname: WOE·212 | Ruby, Daring Tracker | Flavor Text

This ability triggers only once each turn.

trans-unit.resname: WOE·256 | Evolving Wilds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The wilds are unpredictable. Rivers change course, trees shuffle and bend, rocks split and scurry. But mark my words, traveler—the main thing that'll change out there is *you*."\n—Sturwynn, Boundary Lands ranger
trans-unit.target: 「诚然，幻野地势变幻多变：河流忽而改道，树木抽枝弯折，岩石开裂破碎。但旅人啊，请谨记我的话～在外会变的，主要是你自己。」 ～边境地巡林客斯图温

At the beginning of the next combat phase this turn, target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to up to one target creature you don't control.

trans-unit.source: Karmic Justice
trans-unit.target: 业报

trans-unit.resname: WOT·7 | Karmic Justice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls destroys a noncreature permanent you control, you may destroy target permanent that opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 每当由对手操控的咒语或异能消灭一个由你操控的非生物永久物时，你可以消灭目标由该对手操控的永久物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·7 | Karmic Justice | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I have wronged your family on a fool's errand. All I can offer is myself, that you might take your revenge."\n—*The Folly of Syr Perrin*
trans-unit.target: 「我曾因愚人之命而令贵府蒙冤，如今登门谢罪，任君处置。」 ～《佩林爵士愚行录》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·8 | Knightly Valor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Knightly Valor
trans-unit.target: 骑士骁勇

trans-unit.resname: WOT·8 | Knightly Valor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个2/2白色，具警戒异能的骑士衍生生物。 所结附的生物得+2/+2且具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·9 | Land Tax | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Land Tax
trans-unit.target: 抽地税

trans-unit.resname: WOT·9 | Land Tax | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若某对手操控的地比你多，则你可以从你牌库中搜寻至多三张基本地牌，展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·9 | Land Tax | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "'That town is rudely blocking my view!' said the witch. The giant bowed and smiled."\n—*The Goose Mother and Other Tales*
trans-unit.target: 「『那小镇把我视野挡得干干净净！』巫婆愤怒道。巨人微笑欠身，得令退下。」 ～《鹅鹅妈故事集》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·10 | Leyline of Sanctity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Leyline of Sanctity
trans-unit.target: 圣洁地脉

trans-unit.resname: WOT·10 | Leyline of Sanctity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.\nYou have hexproof.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的起手牌中包含了CARDNAME，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。 你具有辟邪异能。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·10 | Leyline of Sanctity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "An enchanted glade revealed itself, offering safety in its warm embrace. Still she walked on."\n—*The Nameless Knight of Summer*
trans-unit.target: 「她眼前出现一片魔法林地，温暖宜人，似可长留此处安全无忧。但她未加理会，径直前行。」 ～《无名仲夏骑士传》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·11 | Phyrexian Unlife | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Unlife
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚体质

trans-unit.resname: WOT·11 | Phyrexian Unlife | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life.\nAs long as you have 0 or less life, all damage is dealt to you as though its source had infect. (Damage is dealt to you in the form of poison counters.)
trans-unit.target: 你不因总生命为0或更少而输掉这盘游戏。 只要你的总生命为0或更少，则所有对你造成的伤害均视为其来源具有侵染地造成。（伤害会以中毒指示物的方式对你造成。）

trans-unit.resname: WOT·11 | Phyrexian Unlife | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "While the realm's great minds quarreled over the strange eclipse, Locthwain fell to the invaders."\n—*Last Stand of the Realm*
trans-unit.target: 「就在世境权威还在为天蚀异象争论不休时，洛司温早已屈从侵攻者。」 ～《世境末日战》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·12 | Rest in Peace | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rest in Peace
trans-unit.target: 得享安息

trans-unit.resname: WOT·12 | Rest in Peace | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile all graveyards.\nIf a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐所有坟墓场。 如果某牌或衍生物将从任何区域进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·12 | Rest in Peace | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The king ordered those lost in sleep be placed in glass gaskets, protected and watched in case they might one day wake."\n—*The Wicked Slumber*
trans-unit.target: 「国王下令，将迷失沉睡者置于玻璃棺中照护看管，静待他们有朝苏醒。」 ～《恶邪倦眠咒》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·13 | Smothering Tithe | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Smothering Tithe
trans-unit.target: 税赋压身

trans-unit.resname: WOT·13 | Smothering Tithe | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手抓一张牌时，该牌手可以支付{2}。若该牌手未如此作，则你派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·13 | Smothering Tithe | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "They laughed with glee as the pixie spun gold from straw. They smiled and shrugged when their curtains and clothes were next on the wheel. Then he grabbed their hair."\n—*The Goose Mother and Other Tales*
trans-unit.target: 「看着碧仙从稻草中纺出黄金，他们笑逐颜开。看着碧仙接着将他们窗帘服饰放上纺车，他们笑容渐止。然后碧仙开始扯起了他们的头发。」 ～《鹅鹅妈故事集》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·14 | As Foretold | Card Name
trans-unit.source: As Foretold
trans-unit.target: 预示成真

trans-unit.resname: WOT·14 | As Foretold | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on CARDNAME.\nOnce each turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for a spell you cast with mana value X or less, where X is the number of time counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，在CARDNAME上放置一个计时指示物。 限每回合一次，你施放法术力值等于或小于X的咒语时，可以支付{0}，而不支付其法术力费用，X为CARDNAME上的计时指示物数量。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·15 | Compulsion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Compulsion
trans-unit.target: 强迫症

trans-unit.resname: WOT·15 | Compulsion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {1}{U}, Discard a card: Draw a card.\n{1}{U}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}，弃一张牌：抓一张牌。 {1}{U}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·15 | Compulsion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "O my love, would that you could understand!\nAdventure beckons; I must take its hand."\n—"The Scholar & the Knight"
trans-unit.target: 「卿卿吾爱，盼你领情！ 冒险呼唤，需我远行。」 ～「学者与骑士」

trans-unit.resname: WOT·16 | Copy Enchantment | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Copy Enchantment
trans-unit.target: 复制结界

trans-unit.resname: WOT·16 | Copy Enchantment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any enchantment on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一结界的复制品来进入战场。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·16 | Copy Enchantment | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "'I don't need anyone else', muttered Hylda. 'You don't need anyone else,' her reflection agreed.\n—Witch of Winter
trans-unit.target: 「『我不需要其他人，』希尔妲低声自语。『你不需要其他人，』镜中影像随声附和。」 ～《凛冬女巫传》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·17 | Curiosity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Curiosity
trans-unit.target: 好奇

trans-unit.resname: WOT·17 | Curiosity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 每当所结附的生物向任一对手造成伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·17 | Curiosity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Valtry gasped. The strange new coral was not coral at all, but a fallen drywalker! But how did it get to the bottom of Loch Larent?"\n—*The Merfolk Who Walked*
trans-unit.target: 「瓦翠惊得倒吸一口气：这株奇怪的新生珊瑚根本就不是珊瑚，而是一个落水的地上人！但它又是怎样来到拉伦特湖底的呢？」 ～《长脚的人鱼》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·18 | Forced Fruition | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forced Fruition
trans-unit.target: 强迫结实

trans-unit.resname: WOT·18 | Forced Fruition | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player draws seven cards.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手施放咒语时，该牌手抓七张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·18 | Forced Fruition | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "'My kingdom for a feast!' quoth the king. A faerie appeared before him, and spoke through a wicked grin: 'As you wish.'"\n—*Tales of the Fae*
trans-unit.target: 「『就用王国换大餐！』国王说道。突然有个仙灵在他面前出现，坏笑道：『如你所愿。』」 ～《仙儿传说》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·19 | Fraying Sanity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fraying Sanity
trans-unit.target: 崩碎心智

trans-unit.resname: WOT·19 | Fraying Sanity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant player\nAt the beginning of each end step, enchanted player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards put into their graveyard from anywhere this turn.
trans-unit.target: 结附于牌手 在每个结束步骤开始时，所结附的牌手磨X张牌，X为本回合中从任何区域进入其坟墓场之牌的数量。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·19 | Fraying Sanity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I saw my mind stretch like cloth on a loom,\nWarping, twisting toward a deathless doom."\n—*A Traveler's Trials*
trans-unit.target: 「在我眼前，自身思绪如织机上的滚动缕线， 拉伸扭曲，缓缓扯向死气沉沉的无尽黯涧。」 ～《旅人渡劫记》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·20 | Hatching Plans | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hatching Plans
trans-unit.target: 策划计谋

trans-unit.resname: WOT·20 | Hatching Plans | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从战场进入坟墓场时，抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·20 | Hatching Plans | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The thief fled with her ill-gotten prize, her mind awhirl with visions of wealth and glory. In her pack, unnoticed, the egg began to stir and crack."\n—*Tales of the Fae*
trans-unit.target: 「飞贼得手后，带着收获信步离开，脑中已满是飞黄腾达的美妙幻想。但她藏在包中的那颗蛋暗自开始扭动、破壳。」 ～《仙儿传说》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·21 | Intruder Alarm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Intruder Alarm
trans-unit.target: 入侵警报

trans-unit.resname: WOT·21 | Intruder Alarm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.\nWhenever a creature enters the battlefield, untap all creatures.
trans-unit.target: 生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。 每当一个生物进战场时，重置所有生物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·21 | Intruder Alarm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The dark forest lit up with a thousand eyes, and for the first time, Jurald considered that the High Fae might be more than myth."\n—*Beyond the Great Henge*
trans-unit.target: 「黑暗森林中刹那之间睁开万千只眼睛，这是裘若首次觉得至高仙可能不仅只是传说。」 ～《圆石阵奇谭》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·22 | Kindred Discovery | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kindred Discovery
trans-unit.target: 同族发现

trans-unit.resname: WOT·22 | Kindred Discovery | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\nWhenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种生物类别。 每当一个由你操控的该类别生物进战场或攻击时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·22 | Kindred Discovery | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The towers were like a song on the night breeze, faint and lovely, calling her home."\n—*A Quickling's Journey*
trans-unit.target: 「高塔映入眼帘，就像那随夜风传来的思乡歌谣，低声轻柔地唤她回家。」 ～《迅敏灵之旅》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·23 | Leyline of Anticipation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Leyline of Anticipation
trans-unit.target: 先制地脉

trans-unit.resname: WOT·23 | Leyline of Anticipation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.\nYou may cast spells as though they had flash.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的起手牌中包含了CARDNAME，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。 你可以将咒语视同具有闪现异能地来施放。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·23 | Leyline of Anticipation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A glowing spring appeared before her, promising untold wisdom. Still she walked on."\n—*The Nameless Knight of Summer*
trans-unit.target: 「她眼前出现一道亮光涌泉，水流淙淙，似在应允传授隐世奇知。但她未加理会，径直前行。」 ～《无名仲夏骑士传》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·24 | Omniscience | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Omniscience
trans-unit.target: 全知全能

trans-unit.resname: WOT·24 | Omniscience | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你手上施放咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·24 | Omniscience | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source:
"They are led by Talion, the Kindly Lord,
First and Greatest of the High Fae,
Sovereign of the Court, the Liege of Laughter,
Finder of the First Yew, and the One True Lord of Eldraine."
—*On the High Fae*
trans-unit.target: 「仙灵全都听令于塔莱恩，仁慈之主，甚伟至高始仙，仙灵廷君主，欢笑王侯，初代紫杉发现者，艾卓唯一真王。」 ～《至高仙传》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·25 | Rhystic Study | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rhystic Study
trans-unit.target: 琉晶研究

trans-unit.resname: WOT·25 | Rhystic Study | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手施放咒语时，除非该牌手支付{1}，否则你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·25 | Rhystic Study | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Despite her father's warnings, Valtry's fascination with the surface only grew. She collected things that fell to the bottom, daydreaming of life on land."\n—*The Merfolk Who Walked*
trans-unit.target: 「虽屡遭父亲劝止，但瓦翠对陆地却越发向往。她不停收集落入湖底的东西，不断想象水面上的生活风貌。」 ～《长脚的人鱼》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·26 | Spreading Seas | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Spreading Seas
trans-unit.target: 海域蔓延

trans-unit.resname: WOT·26 | Spreading Seas | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant land\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card.\nEnchanted land is an Island.
trans-unit.target: 结附于地 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌。 所结附的地是海岛。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·26 | Spreading Seas | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hasty efforts to defend Castle Vantress left it more moat than castle."\n—*Last Stand of the Realm*
trans-unit.target: 「凡翠丝堡守军仓促应战，致使城堡荡然无存，空余护城河水流动。」 ～《世境末日战》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·27 | Bitterblossom | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bitterblossom
trans-unit.target: 苦涩花开

trans-unit.resname: WOT·27 | Bitterblossom | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你失去1点生命并派出一个1/1黑色，具飞行异能的仙灵／浪客衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·27 | Bitterblossom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source:
"Tarry not in Tuinvale,
Ignore the flowers' heady scents.
Take no thing, stay to the trail,
Lest the fae seek recompense."
—*To Walk the Wilds*
trans-unit.target: 「图音谷中勿停留， 鲜花芬芳不要嗅。 路遇他物莫伸手， 以免仙儿来寻仇。」 ～《幻野游记》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·28 | Dark Tutelage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dark Tutelage
trans-unit.target: 黑暗教导

trans-unit.resname: WOT·28 | Dark Tutelage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，展示你的牌库顶牌，并将该牌置于你手上。你失去等同于其法术力值的生命。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·28 | Dark Tutelage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Ours is a path of the outcast, of pain given and pain received. But for the strong, it is a path that leads to power untethered from fae riddles."\n—*The Witch's Way*
trans-unit.target: 「我们所选之道虽然受人唾弃：不仅予人痛苦，自身也会受尽折磨；但对强者而言，这是掌握破除仙灵谜题困扰之强大力量的必由之路。」 ～《巫婆之道》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·29 | Grave Pact | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grave Pact
trans-unit.target: 墓约

trans-unit.resname: WOT·29 | Grave Pact | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物死去时，每位其他牌手各牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·29 | Grave Pact | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "'Fools,' sneered the witch. 'I never intended to leave here alive. And thanks to your dogged insistence on following me, neither will you.'"\n—*Hexes of Dunbarrow*
trans-unit.target: 「『蠢货，』巫婆冷笑道。『我从没想过要活着离开这里。既然你们都已死死跟了过来，那就都别走。』」 ～《黯沼野邪咒》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·30 | Leyline of the Void | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Leyline of the Void
trans-unit.target: 虚空地脉

trans-unit.resname: WOT·30 | Leyline of the Void | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.\nIf a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的起手牌中包含了CARDNAME，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。 如果某牌将从任何区域进入对手的坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·30 | Leyline of the Void | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Malevolent lights pulsed around her, whispering of riches in the dark. Still she walked on."\n—*The Nameless Knight of Summer*
trans-unit.target: 「她眼前出现一阵邪恶幽光，忽明忽暗，似怕人不知深处藏财富。但她未加理会，径直前行。」 ～《无名仲夏骑士传》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·31 | Necropotence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Necropotence
trans-unit.target: 死冥权能

trans-unit.resname: WOT·31 | Necropotence | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Skip your draw step.\nWhenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.\nPay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.
trans-unit.target: 略过你的抓牌步骤。 每当你弃一张牌时，将该牌从你的坟墓场放逐。 支付1点生命：牌面朝下地放逐你的牌库顶牌。在你的下一个结束步骤开始时，将该牌置于你手上。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·32 | Oppression | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oppression
trans-unit.target: 压制

trans-unit.resname: WOT·32 | Oppression | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手施放咒语时，该牌手弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·32 | Oppression | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "'The human world will fall,' whispered the monstrous rat. 'You have but one choice to make: Will you fall with it?'"\n—*Song of the Vermin*
trans-unit.target: 「『人界将亡，』硕鼠低语。『你只需作一个选择：是否要随之一同毁灭？』」 ～《病媒魔曲》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·33 | Oversold Cemetery | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oversold Cemetery
trans-unit.target: 超卖墓园

trans-unit.resname: WOT·33 | Oversold Cemetery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你坟墓场中有四张或更多生物牌，则你可以将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·33 | Oversold Cemetery | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "'Get out! Get out!' the dead screamed.\n'We've not room for one more! Get out!'"\n—*Hexes of Dunbarrow*
trans-unit.target: 「『滚出去！滚出去！』亡者嚷道。『已经没位了！滚出去！』」 ～《黯沼野邪咒》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·34 | Polluted Bonds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Polluted Bonds
trans-unit.target: 污物羁绊

trans-unit.resname: WOT·34 | Polluted Bonds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个地在对手操控下进战场时，该牌手失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·34 | Polluted Bonds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "'Twas the cruelest of ironies: the realm, in desperate need of rest, gripped by endless sleep that offered no comfort."\n—*The Wicked Slumber*
trans-unit.target: 「这真是一个莫大的讽刺：世境虽亟需休养生息，但却困于无尽沉眠中不得安宁。」 ～《恶邪倦眠咒》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·35 | Sanguine Bond | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sanguine Bond
trans-unit.target: 血色羁绊

trans-unit.resname: WOT·35 | Sanguine Bond | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，目标对手失去等量的生命。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·35 | Sanguine Bond | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The witch smiled, savoring every stolen year. Every love the knight would never court, every meal he'd never taste, every honor he'd never win, was sweet as honey on her tongue."\n—*Hexes of Dunbarrow*
trans-unit.target: 「巫婆笑容满面，细细品味她窃来的每年时光。骑士未及赢得的每份爱意，未及品尝的每顿佳肴，未及争来的每份荣耀，在巫婆舌尖都如蜜糖般甜美。」 ～《黯沼野邪咒》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·36 | Stab Wound | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stab Wound
trans-unit.target: 刺创伤

trans-unit.resname: WOT·36 | Stab Wound | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets -2/-2.\nAt the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得-2/-2。 在所结附的生物之操控者的维持开始时，该牌手失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·36 | Stab Wound | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "What first seemed like a ridiculous and vaguely demeaning task quickly turned into a vicious struggle for survival."\n—*Welcome to Sweettooth*
trans-unit.target: 「起初看似荒唐丢脸的无谓任务，很快就变成了尔虞我诈的求生之争。」 ～《甘饴村迎客》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·37 | Vampiric Rites | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vampiric Rites
trans-unit.target: 吸血鬼仪式

trans-unit.resname: WOT·37 | Vampiric Rites | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，牺牲一个生物：你获得1点生命且抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·37 | Vampiric Rites | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Should prying eyes observe the ritual, seize them for the cauldron, and soak the altar with the blood of the witness."\n—The Witch's Way
trans-unit.target: 「若有人胆敢偷看仪式，就将他们丢入锅中，用他们的鲜血来浸洗祭坛。」 ～《巫婆之道》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·38 | Waste Not | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Waste Not
trans-unit.target: 物尽其用

trans-unit.resname: WOT·38 | Waste Not | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent discards a creature card, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.\nWhenever an opponent discards a land card, add {B}{B}.\nWhenever an opponent discards a noncreature, nonland card, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手弃一张生物牌时，你派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。 每当任一对手弃一张地牌时，你加{B}{B}。 每当任一对手弃一张非生物且非地的牌时，你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·39 | Aggravated Assault | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aggravated Assault
trans-unit.target: 急躁的突袭

trans-unit.resname: WOT·39 | Aggravated Assault | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. If it's a main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {3}{R}{R}：重置所有由你操控的生物。如果当前是行动阶段，则会额外多出一个战斗阶段，以及接于其后之一个额外的行动阶段。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·39 | Aggravated Assault | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The knights of Embereth fought with the fire of the Irencrag in their hearts. Though many fell, not a single one retreated."\n—*Last Stand of the Realm*
trans-unit.target: 「鞍博雷骑士心怀伊雷岩烈焰奋勇作战。虽纷纷折戟沙场，却无人后退一步。」 ～《世境末日战》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·40 | Blood Moon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blood Moon
trans-unit.target: 腥红之月

trans-unit.resname: WOT·40 | Blood Moon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.
trans-unit.target: 非基本地都是山脉。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·40 | Blood Moon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.target: 「恶龙惧目，大地翻震， 人民屈膝，违者遭焚。」 ～「龙火之夜」

trans-unit.resname: WOT·41 | Dragon Mantle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dragon Mantle
trans-unit.target: 龙披风

trans-unit.resname: WOT·41 | Dragon Mantle | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card.\nEnchanted creature has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌。 所结附的生物具有「{R}：此生物得+1/+0直到回合结束。」

trans-unit.resname: WOT·41 | Dragon Mantle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "With reckless courage, Cade embraced the flame.\nHe vowed they wouldn't dare forget his name."\n—"The Night of Dragonfire"
trans-unit.target: 「蛮勇凯德挡烈焰， 誓令世人把名念。」 ～「龙火之夜」

trans-unit.resname: WOT·42 | Fiery Emancipation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fiery Emancipation
trans-unit.target: 焰浪无拘

trans-unit.resname: WOT·42 | Fiery Emancipation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals triple that damage to that permanent or player instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个由你操控的来源将对任一永久物或牌手造成伤害，则改为它对该永久物或牌手造成三倍的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·42 | Fiery Emancipation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Mighty Torbran struck the invading phalanx like a bolt from the heavens. When the light faded, only ash remained around him."\n—*Last Stand of the Realm*
trans-unit.target: 「强大的托班从天而降，以雷霆万钧之势直扑侵攻军团。待电光落定之后，四周只余尘土。」 ～《世境末日战》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·43 | Goblin Bombardment | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Goblin Bombardment
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪轰炸

trans-unit.resname: WOT·43 | Goblin Bombardment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物：CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·43 | Goblin Bombardment | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "What redcaps lack in strategic acumen they more than make up for with brazen audacity."\n—*The Kenriths' Royal Bestiary*
trans-unit.target: 「红帽客鬼怪大胆无畏，这点大大补充了他们在战术意识上的不足。」 ～《肯理斯皇家怪物图鉴》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·44 | Impact Tremors | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Impact Tremors
trans-unit.target: 冲击震颤

trans-unit.resname: WOT·44 | Impact Tremors | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each opponent.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·44 | Impact Tremors | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "With tears in his smoke-scorched eyes, he watched the living flames consume the only home he'd ever known."\n—*The Apprentice's Folly*
trans-unit.target: 「他被浓烟熏得泪水直流，只能眼睁睁地看着活体火焰将他所知的唯一家园烧个精光。」 ～《学徒闯大祸》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·45 | Leyline of Lightning | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Leyline of Lightning
trans-unit.target: 雷电地脉

trans-unit.resname: WOT·45 | Leyline of Lightning | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.\nWhenever you cast a spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的起手牌中包含了CARDNAME，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。 每当你施放咒语时，你可以支付{1}。若你如此作，则CARDNAME对目标牌手或鹏洛客造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·46 | Mana Flare | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mana Flare
trans-unit.target: 魔法力闪光

trans-unit.resname: WOT·46 | Mana Flare | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手横置一个地以产生法术力时，该牌手加一点该地已产生的类别之法术力。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·46 | Mana Flare | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I give my heart to the mountain, my memories to the wind. Let my last moment be burned into history."\n—*Daughters of Flame*
trans-unit.target: 「我将心胸献给山河，将记忆奉予清风。就让我焚烧自己，将生命最后时刻写入历史。」 ～《烈焰的女儿》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·47 | Raid Bombardment | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Raid Bombardment
trans-unit.target: 突击轰炸

trans-unit.resname: WOT·47 | Raid Bombardment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less attacks, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且力量等于或小于2的生物攻击时，CARDNAME对该生物所攻击的牌手或鹏洛客造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·47 | Raid Bombardment | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "For slaying dozens of redcaps using only fruit and cakes, the dwarven survivors were dubbed the Gluttoneers."\n—*Assault on Delverhaugh*
trans-unit.target: 「因其单凭水果及蛋糕击杀成群红帽客之壮举，所有的矮人幸存者都被封为饕枪客。」 ～《突袭深掘台》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·48 | Repercussion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Repercussion
trans-unit.target: 后遗症

trans-unit.resname: WOT·48 | Repercussion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, CARDNAME deals that much damage to that creature's controller.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物受到伤害时，CARDNAME对该生物的操控者造成等量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·48 | Repercussion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Tugrunn threw blow after blow, howling with pain as his fist met solid rock. The creature merely stared quizzically at him, unsure when the fight would start."\n—*The Goose Mother and Other Tales*
trans-unit.target: 「图古伦接连出击，拳点如雨，但又因捶石吃痛而哀叫不断。对方只是不解地看着他，不知道这场架什么时候才能开始。」 ～《鹅鹅妈故事集》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·49 | Shared Animosity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shared Animosity
trans-unit.target: 同仇敌忾

trans-unit.resname: WOT·49 | Shared Animosity | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking creature that shares a creature type with it.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物攻击时，战场上每有一个与它具共通生物类别的其他攻击生物，它便得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·49 | Shared Animosity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The feud between dwarves and redcaps had raged for so long that no one could quite recall how it started. Few would believe it was sparked by a long-ago dispute over a spoon."\n—*Assault on Delverhaugh*
trans-unit.target: 「矮人跟红帽客之间积怨已久，甚至已经没人能说清起因到底为何。有传说这梁子是因许久以前的一次争抢汤勺而结下的。」 ～《突袭深掘台》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·50 | Sneak Attack | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sneak Attack
trans-unit.target: 偷袭

trans-unit.resname: WOT·50 | Sneak Attack | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: {R}：你可以将一张生物牌从你手上放进战场。该生物获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，牺牲该生物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·50 | Sneak Attack | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Korlag carefully prepared to try the new 'am bush' strategy he'd heard about."\n—*The Ogre's Revenge*
trans-unit.target: 「寇葛精心准备，迫不及待地想要尝试他新听到的『伏棘』妙计。」 ～《食人魔复仇记》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·51 | Defense of the Heart | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Defense of the Heart
trans-unit.target: 心防

trans-unit.resname: WOT·51 | Defense of the Heart | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice CARDNAME, search your library for up to two creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若某对手操控三个或更多生物，则牺牲CARDNAME，从你牌库中搜寻至多两张生物牌，将这些牌放进在战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·51 | Defense of the Heart | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "And as the rose began to bloom, the curse of Redtooth Keep began, at last, to wither."\n—*Curse of the Werefox*
trans-unit.target: 「随着玫瑰逐渐绽放，赤牙砦下的诅咒方才慢慢褪去。」 ～《半狐诅咒》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·52 | Doubling Season | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Doubling Season
trans-unit.target: 倍产旺季

trans-unit.resname: WOT·52 | Doubling Season | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.\nIf an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某效应将在你的操控下派出一个或数个衍生物，则改为它派出两倍数量的该类衍生物。 如果某效应将在由你操控的永久物上放置一个或数个指示物，则改为在该永久物上放置两倍数量的该类指示物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·53 | Garruk's Uprising | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Garruk's Uprising
trans-unit.target: 贾路的反抗

trans-unit.resname: WOT·53 | Garruk's Uprising | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.\nCreatures you control have trample.\nWhenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则抓一张牌。 由你操控的生物具有践踏异能。 每当一个力量等于或大于4的生物在你的操控下进战场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·54 | Ground Seal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ground Seal
trans-unit.target: 大地封印

trans-unit.resname: WOT·54 | Ground Seal | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card.\nCards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌。 坟墓场中的牌不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·54 | Ground Seal | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "They laid her to rest in the wilds, in a sacred place beyond the reach of nightmares or machines."\n—*The Nameless Knight of Summer*
trans-unit.target: 「她被葬在幻野深处的圣洁地界，纵连梦魇邪械亦不能及。」 ～《无名仲夏骑士传》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·55 | Hardened Scales | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hardened Scales
trans-unit.target: 坚固鳞甲

trans-unit.resname: WOT·55 | Hardened Scales | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果将在某个由你操控的生物上放置一个或数个+1/+1指示物，则改为在其上放置该数量加一的+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·55 | Hardened Scales | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Before me writhed the guardian of my prize,\nA serpent with stone skin and cunning eyes!"\n—*A Traveler's Trials*
trans-unit.target: 「眼前珍宝守卫盘卷身躯，想阻我得手； 巨蛇顽石附体眼神灵动，怕是难赶走！」 ～《旅人渡劫记》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·56 | Leyline of Abundance | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Leyline of Abundance
trans-unit.target: 丰足地脉

trans-unit.resname: WOT·56 | Leyline of Abundance | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.\nWhenever you tap a creature for mana, add an additional {G}.\n{6}{G}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的起手牌中包含了CARDNAME，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。 每当你横置一个生物以产生法术力时，额外加{G}。 {6}{G}{G}：在每个由你操控的生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·57 | Nature's Will | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nature's Will
trans-unit.target: 大自然之愿

trans-unit.resname: WOT·57 | Nature's Will | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, tap all lands that player controls and untap all lands you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，横置所有由该牌手操控的地并重置所有由你操控的地。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·57 | Nature's Will | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The troll took the fauns' hesitation as fear and roared in triumph. In truth, they'd seen the ledge begin to crack beneath his weight."\n—*The Goose Mother and Other Tales*
trans-unit.target: 「巨魔见羊怪行动迟缓，觉得自己已经威服对方，不禁发出胜利怒号。然而，羊怪是看到巨魔脚下岩石不堪重压开始崩裂，才没有轻举妄动。」 ～《鹅鹅妈故事集》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·58 | Parallel Lives | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Parallel Lives
trans-unit.target: 平行生命

trans-unit.resname: WOT·58 | Parallel Lives | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某效应将在你的操控下派出一个或数个衍生物，则改为它派出两倍数量的该类衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·58 | Parallel Lives | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Brave Syr Armont mused: Was the elves' true nature that of day's civility or night's savagery? Could such bestial rage be bestowed by curse alone?"\n—*Curse of the Werefox*
trans-unit.target: 「勇敢的娅蒙爵士若有所思：妖精真正的本性到底为何？是白天的谦恭有礼，还是夜晚的凶蛮无道？这等狂野的兽性，难道就只因为诅咒之故？」 ～《半狐诅咒》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·59 | Primal Vigor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Primal Vigor
trans-unit.target: 原初活力

trans-unit.resname: WOT·59 | Primal Vigor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If one or more tokens would be created, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.\nIf one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature, twice that many +1/+1 counters are put on that creature instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果将派出一个或数个衍生物，则改为派出两倍数量的该类衍生物。 如果将在某生物上放置一个或数个+1/+1指示物，则改为在该生物上放置该数量两倍的+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·60 | Prismatic Omen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Prismatic Omen
trans-unit.target: 五彩预兆

trans-unit.resname: WOT·60 | Prismatic Omen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Lands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的地均额外具有所有基本地类别。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·60 | Prismatic Omen | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "There would be time later to mourn the lost, to weep for their fallen homes and lost treasures. But for now, they breathed in the untainted air and allowed themselves to hope again."\n—*Last Stand of the Realm*
trans-unit.target: 「日后有的是时间来为死难同胞发丧，为失落家园和损失财富落泪。如今是要让生者存于未受污染的空气之下，让他们重燃光复家园的希望。」 ～《世境末日战》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·61 | Season of Growth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Season of Growth
trans-unit.target: 成长季节

trans-unit.resname: WOT·61 | Season of Growth | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1.\nWhenever you cast a spell that targets a creature you control, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，占卜1。 每当你施放以由你操控之生物为目标的咒语时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·62 | Unnatural Growth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Unnatural Growth
trans-unit.target: 超凡成长

trans-unit.resname: WOT·62 | Unnatural Growth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each combat, double the power and toughness of each creature you control until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 在每次战斗开始时，将每个由你操控之生物的力量和防御力均加倍直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: WOT·62 | Unnatural Growth | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source:
"Should you hear witchstalkers howl,
Best to hide or run away.
They hunt witches vile and foul.
Fear both predator and prey."
—*To Walk the Wilds*
trans-unit.target: 「猎巫狼群一声吼， 赶忙躲起快逃走。 猎杀巫婆下狠手， 猎人猎物见了愁。」 ～《幻野游记》

trans-unit.resname: WOT·63 | Utopia Sprawl | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Utopia Sprawl
trans-unit.target: 理想境蔓生

trans-unit.resname: WOT·63 | Utopia Sprawl | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant Forest\nAs CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a color.\nWhenever enchanted Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of the chosen color.
trans-unit.target: 结附于树林 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种颜色。 每当横置所结附的树林以产生法术力时，其操控者额外加一点所选颜色的法术力。
